episode_title: 514 - The One Where Everyone Finds Out

content.description: Monica and Rachel’s, everyone is eating some Chinese food.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Oh hey, you guys, look! Ugly Naked Guy is putting stuff in boxes!
(They all run and join her at the window.)

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: I’d say from the looks of it; our naked buddy is moving.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Ironically, most of the boxes seem to be labeled clothes.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Ohh, I’m gonna miss that big old squishy butt.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: And we’re done with the chicken fried rice.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Hey! Hey! If he’s moving, maybe I should try to get his place!

content.speaker: All
content.text: Good idea! Yes!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: It would be so cool to live across from you guys!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Hey, yeah! Then we could do that telephone thing! Y’know, you have a can, we have a can and it’s connected by a string!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Or we can do the actual telephone thing.

content.description: Ugly Naked Guy’s apartment, Ross, Rachel, and Phoebe are checking out the place. Luckily, Ugly Naked Guy is nowhere to be seen.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Oh my God! I love this apartment! Isn’t it perfect?! I can’t believe I never realized how great it is!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Well that is because your eye immediately goes to the big naked man.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: It’s amazing! You better hurry up and fill out an application or I’m gonna beat you to it.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Ohh. (Phoebe takes a couple of steps to the door and Ross quickly hurries out.)

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Well, I never thought I’d say this, but I’m gonna go use Ugly Naked Guy’s bathroom. (Does so.)

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Oh, look! There’s Monica and Chandler! (Starts yelling.) Hey! Hey, you guys! Hey! (Chandler and Monica start taking each other’s clothes off.) Ohh!! Ohh! Ahh-ahhh!!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: What?!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Ahhh!! Chandler and Monica!! Chandler and Monica!!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Oh my God!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Chandler AND Monica!!!!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: OH MY GOD!!!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: OH!! MY EYES!!! MY EYES!!!!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Phoebe!! Phoebe!! It’s okay!! It’s okay!!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: NO! THEY’re DOING IT!!!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: I KNOW!! I KNOW!! I KNOW!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: YOU KNOW?!!!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Yes, I know! And Joey knows! But Ross doesn’t know so you have to stop screaming!!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: What’s going on?

content.speaker: Phoebe and Rachel
content.text: Ohhh!!!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: HI!! Hi!
content.parenthetical: trying to divert his attention from the window by jumping up and down

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: What?! What?!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Nothing! Oh God, we’re just so excited that you want to get this apartment!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Actually, it looks really good. (Turns towards the window and now Phoebe starts jumping to divert his attention.)

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Get in here!!! (Motions to join her and Rachel.)
(Ross starts jumping and screaming incoherently and hops over and joins in on the group hug.)

content.description: Central Perk, Phoebe and Rachel are there talking about Chandler and Monica.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: You mean whenever Monica and Chandler where like y’know doing laundry or going grocery shopping or—Oh! All that time Monica spent on the phone with sad Linda from camp!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Uh-huh, doing it. Doing it. Phone doing it.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Oh! Oh, I can’t believe it! I mean I think it’s great! For him. She might be able to do better.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Hey guys!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Joey! Come here! Come here!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: What? What?

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Phoebe just found out about Monica and Chandler.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: You mean how they’re friends and nothing more? (Glares at Rachel.)

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: No. Joey, she knows ! We were at Ugly Naked Guy’s apartment and we saw them doing it through the window. (Joey gasps) Actually, we saw them doing it up against the window.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Okay, so now they know that you know and they don’t know that Rachel knows?

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Yes, but y’know what? It doesn’t matter who knows what. Now, enough of us know that we can just tell them that we know! Then all the lying and the secrets would finally be over!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Or, we could not tell them we know and have a little fun of our own.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Wh-what do you mean?

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Well y’know every time that they say that like they’re doing laundry we’ll just give them a bunch of laundry to do.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Ohhh, I-I would enjoy that!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: No-no-no! No-no wait Rach, you know what would even be more fun? Telling them.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Ehhh, no, I wanna do Phoebe’s thing.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: I can’t take any…

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: No! You don’t have to do anything! Just don’t tell them that we know!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Noo! I can’t take any more secrets! (To Rachel) I’ve got your secrets. I’ve got their secrets. I got secrets of my own y’know!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: You don’t have any secrets!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Oh yeah? Well, you don’t know about Hugsy, my bedtime penguin pal. (Joey shies away.)

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: So umm, how-how are we gonna mess with them?

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Ugh.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Well, you could use your position y’know as the roommate.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Okay.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: And then. I would use y’know the strongest tool at my disposal. My sexuality.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Hello children!

content.speaker: All
content.text: Hey!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Okay, watch, learn, and don’t eat my cookie.
(She gets up and goes over to Chandler who’s ordering some coffee from Gunther.)

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Hey.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Hey! Ooh, wow that jacket looks great on you!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Really?

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Yeah the material feels so soft—hello Mr. Bicep! Have you been working out?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Well, I try to y’know, squeeze things. (Phoebe giggles uncontrollably.) Are you okay?

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Well, if you really wanna know, I’m—Oh! I can’t tell you this.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Phoebe, it’s me. You can tell me anything.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Well actually you’re the one person I can’t tell this too. And the one person I want to the most.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: What’s going on?

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: I think it’s just y’know that I haven’t been with a guy in so long and how sometimes you’re looking for something and you just don’t even see that it’s right there in front of you sipping coffee—Oh no, have I said to much? Well it’s just something to think about. I know I will.
(She makes a show of bending over to get her coat and showing off her bum. She then walks out, leaving no one to eat her cookie.)

content.description: Chandler’s bedroom, Chandler and Monica are there, of course. Like who else would it be, duh!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: You are so cute! How did you get to be so cute?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Well, my Grandfather was Swedish and my Grandmother was actually a tiny little bunny.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Okay, now you’re even cuter!!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Y’know that is a popular opinion today I must say.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: What?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: The weirdest thing happened at the coffee house, I think, I think Phoebe was hitting on me.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: What are you talking about?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: I’m telling you I think Phoebe thinks I’m foxy.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: That’s not possible!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Ow!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: I’m sorry it’s just, Phoebe just always thought you were, you were charming in a, in a sexless kind of way.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Oh, y’know I-I can’t hear that enough.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: I’m sorry, I think that you just misunderstood her.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: No, I didn’t misunderstand, okay? She was all over me! She touched my bicep for crying out loud!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: This bicep?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Well it’s not flexed right now!

content.description: Monica and Rachel’s, Monica, Rachel, Phoebe, and Chandler are there. Monica is entering from her room.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Hey Mon, what are you doing now? Wanna come see a movie with us?

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Uhh, y’know actually I was gonna do some laundry.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Oh.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Hey Chandler, wanna do it with me?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Sure, I’ll do it with ya.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Okay.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Okay great, hold on a sec! (She runs to her room and returns carrying a huge bag of laundry.) Oh, here you go! You don’t mind do ya? That would really help me out a lot! Thanks!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: I mean I-I don’t I think I have enough quarters.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: I have quarters! (She holds up a bag of quarters.)

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Hey!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Hey Ross! Any word on the apartment yet?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Well, I called over there and it turns out Ugly Naked Guy is subletting it himself and he’s already had like a hundred applicants.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Oh.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: No-no, I got the edge. I know it’s not exactly ethical but I sent him a little bribe to
tip the scales in my direction. Check it out, you can probably see it from the window. (They all head to the window.)

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Oh, is it that pinball machine with the big bow on it?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: No.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: That new mountain bike?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: No.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Well what did you send?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: A basket of mini-muffins.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: But there’s a whole table of mini-muffin baskets. Which one did you send?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: The small one.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: What?! You-you actually thought that basket was gonna get you the apartment?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Well yeah! Someone sent us a basket at work once and people went crazy over those little muffins. It was the best day.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Your work makes me sad.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Oh man! I want that place so much!! I was so sure that was gonna work! There’s twelve bucks I’ll never see again! (Exits.)

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: All right honey, we’d better go if we wanna catch that movie.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Bye!

content.speaker: All
content.text: Bye!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Bye Chandler! (She walks up to him.) (Quietly.) I miss you already. (She pinches his butt.)

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Okay, did you see that?! With the inappropriate and the pinching!!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Actually, I did!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Okay, so now do you believe that she’s attracted to me?

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Ohhh, oh my God! Oh my God! She knows about us!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Are you serious?

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Phoebe knows and she’s just trying to freak us out! That’s the only explanation for it!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Okay but what about y’know my pinchable butt and my bulging biceps—She knows!

content.description: Chandler, Joey, and Ross’s, Joey is snoozing with Hugsy, his bedtime penguin pal and Chandler and Monica come storming in.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Joey!
(Joey quickly tries to hide Hugsy by throwing it over his head.)

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Yeah?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Phoebe knows about us!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Well I didn’t tell them!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Them?! Who’s them?

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Uhhh, Phoebe and Joey.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Joey!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: And Rachel. I would’ve told you but they made me promise not to tell!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Oh man!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: I’m sorry! But hey, it’s over now, right? Because you can tell them that you know they know and I can go back to knowing absolutely nothing!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Unless…

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: No! Not unless! Look this must end now!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Oh man, they think they are so slick messing with us! But see they don’t know that we know that they know! So…

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Ahh yes, the messers become the messies!

content.description: Monica and Rachel’s, Ross is looking at Ugly Naked Guy’s apartment through binoculars.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Noooo.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Oh Ross, honey you gotta stop torturing yourself!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Yeah, why don’t you just find another apartment?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Look I’ve already looked at like a thousand apartments this month and none of them even compares to that one!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Y’know what you should do?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Huh?

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: You should find out what his hobbies are and then use that to bond with him. Yeah! Like if I would strike up a conversation about say umm, sandwiches. Or uh, or my underwear.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: I’m listening.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: See?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: That is a great idea! And! I know Ugly Naked Guy because we’ve been watching him for like five years so that gives me back my edge! Oh, let’s see now he had the trampoline.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: He broke that.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Well, he had gravity boots.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Yeah, he broke those too.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: So he likes to break stuff.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Okay, I’ve got to go pick up Ben but I-I will figure something out. (He opens the door and stops.) Hey, didn’t he used to have a cat?

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: I wouldn’t bring that up, it would probably just bum him out.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Yeah, poor cat, never saw that big butt coming.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Right. (Exits.)
(The phone rings and Rachel answers it.)

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Hello! (Listens) Oh yeah! Hey! Hold on a second she’s right here! (To Phoebe) It’s Chandler.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Oh? (Takes the phone from Rachel.) Hello you.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Hello Phoebe, I’ve been thinking about you all day. (He’s holding the phone so that Monica can hear it as well.)

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Eh?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Well you know that thing you said before, I’d be lying if I said I wasn’t intrigued.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Really?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Yeah, listen, Joey isn’t gonna be here tonight so why don’t you come over and I’ll let you uh, feel my bicep. Or maybe more.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: I’ll have to get back to you on that. Okay, bye! (Hangs up.) Oh my God! He wants me to come over and feel his bicep and more!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Are you kidding?!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: No!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: I can not believe he would do that to Mon—Whoa! (She stops suddenly and slowly turns to point at Joey. Joey is avoiding her eyes.) Joey, do they know that we know?

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: No.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Joey!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: They know you know.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Ugh, I knew it! Oh I cannot believe those two!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: God, they thought they can mess with us! They’re trying to mess with us?! They don’t know that we know they know we know! (Joey just shakes his head.) Joey, you can’t say anything!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: I couldn’t even if I wanted too.

content.description: Outside Ugly Naked Guy’s apartment, Ross is knocks on the door and Ugly Naked Guy answers it. He’s ugly. He’s naked. And he’s holding a huge jumbo soda.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Good evening, sir. My name is Ross Geller. I’m one of the people who applied for the apartment. And I-I realize that the competition is fierce but—I’m sorry. I, I can’t help but notice you’re naked and (He claps his hands.) I applaud you. Man, I wish I was naked. I mean, this-this looks so great. That is how God intended it.

content.description: Monica and Rachel’s, Chandler and Monica and Rachel and Phoebe are planning their respective strategies to break the other pairing. Joey is not amused.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Look at them, they’re-they’re panicked!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Oh yeah, they’re totally gonna back down!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Oh yeah!
[Cut to Phoebe and Rachel sitting on the couch.]

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: All right. All right! If he wants a date? He’s gonna get a date. All right, I’m gonna go in.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: All right. Be sexy.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Please.
(She saunters over to Chandler with a mean pair of ‘Come hither’ eyes and she glares at Monica.)

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: So Chandler, I-I’d love to come by tonight.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Really?
content.parenthetical: initially worried, but gets over it

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Oh absolutely. Shall we say, around seven?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Yes.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Good. I’m really looking forward to you and me having sexual intercourse.
(As she walks away, Chandler mouths a scream to Monica. How motions and mouths, “It’s okay, it’s okay.”)

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Hey-hey, check it out! Check it out! Ugly Naked Guy has a naked friend!
(They all run over to the window.)

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Oh yeah! (She gasps.) Oh my God! That is our friend! (Monica covers her face.) It’s Naked Ross! (Monica turns and buries her face in Chandler’s shoulder.)

content.speaker: All
content.text: Yeah, it is! Naked Ross!!

content.description: Monica and Rachel’s, Rachel is getting Phoebe ready for her date.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Show time!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Okay, Rachel, get me perfume!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Okay! (She runs to get some.)

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: And Joey, get me a bottle of wine and glasses? (He begrudgingly does so.)
(In the meantime, Rachel has returned with the perfume and sprays a mist out in front of Phoebe who walks through the mist and does a little spin.)
[Cut to Chandler, Joey, and Ross’s, Monica is getting Chandler ready for his half of the plan.]

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: All right, it’ll be great! You just make her think you wanna have sex with her! It’ll totally freak her out!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Okay, listen, how far am I gonna have to go with her?

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Relax, she-she’s gonna give in way before you do!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: How do you know?!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Because you’re on my team! And my team always wins!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: At this?!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Just go get some! (Kisses him.) Go! (She runs to hide in the bathroom.)
[Cut to the hallway, Phoebe is outside getting some last minute instructions from Rachel.]

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Okay honey, now I’m gonna try to listen from right here!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Okay.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Okay? Whoa, wait! (She undoes one button on Phoebe’s dress.)

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Good idea!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Yeah, oh wait! (She goes for another one.)

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Oh now, don’t give away the farm!
(Phoebe knocks on the door with the wine and Chandler answers it. Rachel hides next to the door.)

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Phoebe.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Chandler.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Come on in.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: I was going too. (They go inside and he closes the door.) Umm, I brought some wine. Would you like some?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Sure.
(She makes a big show out of pulling out the cork and pours the wine.)

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: So, here we are. Nervous?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Me? No. You?

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: No, I want this to happen.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: So do I.
(They click their glasses and take a sip. That sip turns into a gulp, which quickly progresses into their mutual draining of their glasses at once.)

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: I’m gonna put on some music.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Maybe, maybe I’ll dance for you. (She starts doing a rather suggestive and seductive dance that’s silly at the same time.)

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: You look good.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Thanks! Y’know, that when you say things like that it makes me wanna rip that sweater vest right off!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Well, why don’t we move this into the bedroom?

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Really?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Oh, do you not want to?

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: No. No! It’s just y’know first, I wanna take off all my clothes and have you rub lotion on me.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Well that would be nice. I’ll go get the lotion.
[Cut to the bathroom, Chandler is entering.]

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Listen, this is totally getting out of hand! Okay? She wants me to put lotion on her!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: She’s bluffing!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Look, she’s not backing down! She went like this! (He does a little mimic of her dance.)
[Cut to the hallway where Phoebe is conferring with Rachel.]

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: He’s not backing down. He went to get lotion.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Oh man! Aren’t you guys done yet?! I wanna sit in my chair!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Joey look, just look at it this way, the sooner Phoebe breaks Chandler the sooner this is all over and out in the open.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Ooh!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Okay!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: I like that! (To Phoebe) Oh, okay! Show him your bra! He’s afraid of bras! Can’t work ’em! (He swiftly rips open the front of Phoebe’s dress revealing her bra.)

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Joey! (Examining the dress.) Wow, you didn’t rip off any buttons.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: It’s not my first time.
[Cut to the bathroom.]

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: You go back out there and you seduce her till she cracks!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Okay, give me a second! (Pause) Did you clean up in here?

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Of course.
[Cut back to the living room. Chandler slowly exits the bathroom and gets pushed from behind by Monica and sees Phoebe closing the apartment door.)

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Oh, you’re-you’re going?

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Umm, not without you, lover. (She slowly walks over to him and is showcasing her bra.) So, this is my bra.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: It’s very, very nice. Well, come here. I’m very were gonna be having all the sex.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: You should be. I’m very bendy. (Pause) I’m gonna kiss you now.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Not if I kiss you first.

(They move closer to together and Phoebe hesitantly puts her hand on Chandler’s hip. He puts his hand on her left hip but then decides to put his hand on her left hip. Phoebe then grabs his butt. Chandler goes for her breast, but stops and puts his hand on her shoulder.)

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Ooh.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Well, I guess there’s nothing left for us to do but-but kiss.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Here it comes. Our first kiss.

(They slowly and hesitantly move their lips together and kiss gently. Phoebe has her eyes wide open in shock and Chandler is squinting. He finally breaks the kiss after only a short while and pushes Phoebe away.)

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Okay! Okay! Okay! You win! You win!! I can’t have sex with ya!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: And why not?!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Because I’m in love with Monica!!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: You’re-you’re what?!
(Monica comes out of the bathroom like a bolt, and Rachel and Joey both enter.)

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Love her! That’s right, I…LOVE…HER!!! I love her!! (They walk together and hug.) I love you, Monica.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: I love you too Chandler. (They kiss.)

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: I just—I thought you guys were doing it, I didn’t know you were in love!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Dude!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: And hats off to Phoebe. Quite a competitor. (Pause) And might I say your breasts are still showing.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: God! (She turns and buttons up.)

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: All right! So that’s it! It’s over! Everybody knows!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Well actually, Ross doesn’t.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Yes, and we’d appreciate it if no one told him yet.
(Joey suddenly gets very angry.)

content.description: Ross’s new apartment, he is showing his boss, Dr. Ledbetter his new place and new outlook on life.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: A new place for a new Ross. I’m gonna have you and all the guys from work over once it’s y’know, furnished.

content.speaker: Dr. Ledbetter
content.text: I must say it’s nice to see you back on your feet.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Well I am that. And that whole rage thing is definitely behind me.

content.speaker: Dr. Ledbetter
content.text: I wonder if its time for you to rejoin our team at the museum?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Oh Donald that-that would be great. I am totally ready to come back to work. I—What? (He notices something through the window.) No! Wh… What are you doing?!! (Dr. Ledbetter is slowly backing away.) GET OFF MY SISTER!!!!!!!!!!!!!
